subject: Alpine Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: The Rosa Khutor Alpine Center, which was built for the Winter Olympics in 2014, welcomed some of the world's top ski racers over the weekend. Many -- but not all -- reacted positively to the course.
snippet: The Rosa Khutor Alpine Center, which was built for the Winter Olympics in 2014, welcomed some of the world's top ski racers over the weekend. Many -- but not all -- reacted positively to the course.
